com.lpoo.game.view.screens

Class HudMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lpoo.game.view.screens.HudMenu

  • class HudMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for the HUD during the Game.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HudMenu.Request
      Possible Requests to the Game Screen.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int currentLevel
      Current Level Number (Level1, Level2, etc)
      private HudMenu.Request currentRequest
      Represents the current Hud Menu's Request to the Game Screen.
      private static float FONT_SCALE
      The Font rescaling factor, for the score representation.
      private Armadillo game
      The current game session.
      private static float HORIZONTAL_PAD
      The HUD elements distance to the horizontal screen limits.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage hud
      A Stage used to represent the HUD, containing the score and the pause Button.
      private static float HUD_ELEMENTS_SIZE
      The Side Size of the HUD elements.
      private static float HUD_VIEWPORT_HEIGHT
      The height of the viewport in pixels.
      private static float HUD_VIEWPORT_WIDTH
      The width of the HUD viewport in pixels.
      private GameModel.ModelState lastState
      Represents the last game's state.
      private GameModel model
      The current Game Model, in display on the screen.
      private boolean options_flag
      Flag responsible for indicating whether the HUD or the Options Menu should be drawn.
      private OptionsMenu optionsMenu
      A Class used to represent the Menu that appears when the game is paused / over / won.
      private float score
      Represents the current level's score.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Label scoreText
      Label containing the string referencing the current score.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Skin skin
      Skin used in the HUD elements.
      private static float VERTICAL_PAD
      The HUD elements distance to the vertical screen limits.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.utils.viewport.Viewport viewport
      The ViewPort used for the HUD Stage.

        Represents the current Hud Menu's Request to the Game Screen.

      • HUD_VIEWPORT_WIDTH

        private static final float HUD_VIEWPORT_WIDTH
        The width of the HUD viewport in pixels. The height is automatically calculated using the screen ratio.

        Constant Field Values

        private static final float HUD_VIEWPORT_HEIGHT
        The height of the viewport in pixels. The height is automatically calculated using the screen ratio.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HudMenu

        HudMenu(Armadillo game,
        GameModel model)
        HudMenu's Constructor. It takes the current game and the current game model to initialize. It initializes all the HUD elements, in the right positions.
        Parameters:
        game - The current game session.
        model - The current game Model.

    • Method Detail

      • initHUD

        private void initHUD()
        Function used to initialize all the elements of the HUD and add the respective Listeners.

      • updateScore

        private void updateScore()
        Function responsible for updating the current score

      • getScoreString

        java.lang.String getScoreString()
        Function that returns the current score, in a String format.
        Returns:
        Score's string representation.

      • update

        HudMenu.Request update(GameModel.ModelState state,
                       int level)
        The function responsible for updating the current HudMenu. Depending of the HudMenu update, the HudMenu might have a request.
        Parameters:
        state - The current Game Model state.
        level - The current level being played.
        Returns:
        The HudMenu's Request.

      • draw

        void draw()
        The function that draws the current HudMenu in the screen.

      • togglePause

        void togglePause()
        Function responsible for pausing the current game model.

      • getCurrentLevel

        int getCurrentLevel()
        Returns:
        current Level being played by the User.

      • loadNextLevel

        void loadNextLevel()
        Function used to load the next Level.

      • startLevel

        void startLevel()
        Function used to start the next Level.

      • resetRequest

        void resetRequest()
        Function used to set the current HudMenu's request to NONE.
